author: The Associated Press
title: U.S. to suspend immigrant visas from 75 countries over public assistance concerns
description: The State Department says it will suspend the processing of immigrant visas for citizens of 75 countries whose nationals are deemed likely to require public assistance while living in the United States.
content: WASHINGTON The State Department said Wednesday it will suspend the processing of immigrant visas for citizens of 75 countries, including Afghanistan, Iran, Russia and Somalia, whose nationals the Tru… [+5066 chars]
